effect.sun_moon: This Pokémon cannot be paralyzed. If a Pokémon is paralyzed and acquires this ability, its paralysis is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This Pokémon cannot be paralyzed. If a Pokémon is paralyzed and acquires this ability, its paralysis is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This Pokémon cannot be paralyzed. If a Pokémon is paralyzed and acquires this ability, its paralysis is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
